resources.string: Perform awesome tasks on your connected peer with a Shake. You can also trigger those actions swiping up from your Navigation Bar!
Handle App installs or uninstalls in all your devices at once. Wait for the dialog that will politely ask you!
Sync certain settings like WiFi or Volume on your peer device. They will be magically shared!
We couldn\'t open the app because it\'s not installed!
We don\'t support this app right now, it was not installed by Play Store
QPair: You\'re not connected to Peer
We couldn\'t uninstall because app was not found:
Enter HubToDate\'s community and share your input!
Your peer device battery is low
Your peer device storage is low
Do you wish to install this app on your QPair device?
Do you wish to uninstall this app on your QPair device?
Do you wish to change the Input Method on your QPair device?
Do you wish to sync the Wifi state on your QPair device?
Do you wish to sync the volume on your QPair device?
HubToDate was added as Device Administrator
HubToDate is no longer a Device Administrator
HubToDate will be allowed to turn your Screen Off when you ask to do so in your peer device
HubToDate is not a Device Administrator. Please check Security settings.
